js: var winter;var night;var shutter;Blockly.runEvery(function(86400) {   winter = (new Date().getMonth()) > 11 && (new Date().getMonth()) <= 3;  night = (new Date().getHours()) > 18 && (new Date().getHours()) < 7;  if (winter && night) {    var shutter_list = (EasyFlap.Shutters);    for (var shutter_index in shutter_list) {      shutter = shutter_list[shutter_index];      EasyFlap.closeShutter(shutter);    }  }});
